title: Change StAX implementation in Solr
description: Per http://lucene.markmail.org/message/tnsfyvykendpzcwq?q= we need to replace the StAX jar with one that doesn't have IP issues in question.  This was already fixed on trunk, see http://lucene.markmail.org/message/bcg2oxqpzd66pwlq?q=list:org%2Eapache%2Elucene%2Esolr-dev

comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.content:
Committed revision 694305.

Also fixed the Maven template on trunk
